description: Change of use of an existing outbuilding from a store to Gym for HMO residents
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (LaVaastu/2019/193/01, LaVaastu/2019/193/02 & LaVaastu/2019/193/04, received on 14/11/19;
LaVaastu/2019/193/02/ REV A, received on 14/01/20) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for a gym for the sole use of residents of the property known as 47 Rosemary Avenue and shall not be used otherwise than for purposes incidental to the occupation of the main property and for the avoidance of doubt shall not be used as primary living accommodation such as a bedroom, bathroom, toilet, kitchen or living room or for business purposes.
